short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension add some event to your CiscoWebex video (Polimi)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds some keyboard events to your CiscoWebex (Polimi) and Microsoft Sharepoint videos.
Press one of these keys on your keyboard to activate an event:
space: play/pause
➡️ : forward 15s
⬅️ : backward 15s
⬆️ : video speed + 0.1
⬇️ : video speed - 0.1
m : mute/unmute (only on Webex player)
